attributes.action: Government funded concert to show solidarity to Lesbian Gay and Trangendered people in Russia
attributes.additional_details: On behalf of a multicultural diverse population that is The United Kingdom, we hereby ask for partial funding and support to ask for an awareness concert to highlight the horrific treatment that the Russian government condones towards its Gay, Lesbian and Transgendered citizens. Enough is enough, it's time the UK takes a stand and shows the world, most importantly RUSSIA that we respect EVERYONE for who they are.

rejection.details: The Government does not fund individual projects such as this.  It is, though, making representations to Russia at diplomatic levels.
